title: 22: S3E22 – "Hazardous Homecomings" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Jon Thomas, Jarvis B. Chavez, MXXNY, and Alice1nWonder, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about hellish houses, paranormal predators, uncontrollable urges, and nefarious numbers. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e22
